memberdef.type: std::function< std::vector< T >(const Real, const std::vector< T > &)>
memberdef.definition: typedef std::function<std::vector<T>(const Real, const std::vector<T>&)> QuantLib::AdaptiveRungeKutta< T >::OdeFct
memberdef.name: OdeFct

memberdef.definition: typedef std::function<T(const Real, const T)> QuantLib::AdaptiveRungeKutta< T >::OdeFct1d
memberdef.name: OdeFct1d

memberdef.argsstring: (const Real eps=1.0e-6, const Real h1=1.0e-4, const Real hmin=0.0)
memberdef.name: AdaptiveRungeKutta

detaileddescription.para:
The class is constructed with the following inputs:
eps prescribed error for the solution
h1 start step size
hmin smallest step size allowed

memberdef.argsstring: (const OdeFct &ode, const std::vector< T > &y1, Real x1, Real x2)
memberdef.name: operator()

detaileddescription.para: Integrate the ode from $ x1 $ to $ x2 $ with initial value condition $ f(x1)=y1 $.
The ode is given by a function $ F: R \times K^n \rightarrow K^n $ as $ f'(x) = F(x,f(x)) $, $K=R, C$

memberdef.argsstring: (const OdeFct1d &ode, T y1, Real x1, Real x2)
memberdef.name: operator()

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< T > &y, const std::vector< T > &dydx, Real &x, Real htry, Real eps, const std::vector< Real > &yScale, Real &hdid, Real &hnext, const OdeFct &derivs)
memberdef.name: rkqs

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > &y, const std::vector< T > &dydx, Real x, Real h, std::vector< T > &yout, std::vector< T > &yerr, const OdeFct &derivs)
memberdef.name: rkck
